reviewText: I was expecting some catagory III action at first (actually, this film is rated IIB) , and was disappointed when I saw how mild it is; but that disappointment soon faded.  I love this movie!!  This little thriller had me at the edge of my seat.  If you like solid thrillers with twists, then this one's for you.  I really enjoyed this one.  The less I say about this movie, the better.  Enjoy!
